member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_FRAME_FORMAT
member.summary: Describes how a video stream is interlaced.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_FRAME_FORMAT.D3D11_VIDEO_FRAME_FORMAT_INTERLACED_TOP_FIELD_FIRST
member.summary: Frames are interlaced. The top field of each frame is displayed first.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_FRAME_FORMAT.D3D11_VIDEO_FRAME_FORMAT_INTERLACED_BOTTOM_FIELD_FIRST
member.summary: Frame are interlaced. The bottom field of each frame is displayed first.
